Text: Sale of Interests Cc The percent membership interest in Doyle I LLC owned by Power Generation Investco LLC was sold on November to The Walton Electric Membership Corporation Doyle I LLC owned percent of the membership interest in Doyle II LLC The records for this entity were conveyed also Corporate Records Evidence of this sale is to be hand delivered Lori Pinder Supervisor Corporate Services and Assistant Secretary Smith St Room Houston Texas Fax

Sale of Haywood Power I LLC Cc Although this entity was sold earlier this year an announcement email was not issued at that time due to lack of documents On May Haywood Power I LLC GHPWR sold percent of the ownership interest was assigned to AES Greystone LLC Please share with interested individuals within your groups Corporate Records Evidence to be hand delivered Lori Pinder Supervisor Corporate Services and Assistant Secretary Smith St Room Houston Texas Fax

Sale of Fountain Valley Power LLCAlthough this entity was sold earlier this year an announcement email was not issued at that time due to lack of complete documentation On March Fountain Valley Power LLC VFVPL sold percent of the ownership interest was assigned to Black Hills Fountain Valley LLC Please share with interested individuals within your groups Corporate Records Evidence to be hand delivered Lori Pinder Supervisor Corporate Services and Assistant Secretary Smith St Room Houston Texas Fax

EWS Networks EntitiesTana Your entities are classified as being potentially subject to FERC reporting requirements Jim Derrick and Greg Whalley were to come off the slates Nov I need to paper the GlisanBowen swap as well as the replacements for Messrs Derrick and Whalley Please let me know who will replace Messrs Derrick and Whalley so I can paper all of the above for the entities listed below Clickpapercom LLC CommodityLogic LLC DealBench LLC Enron Net Works LLC EnronOnline LLC Directors JDerrick MHaedicke GWhalley Thanks Lori Pinder Supervisor Corporate Services and Assistant Secretary Smith St Room Houston Texas Fax

Revocation of AIF Enron Networks Investments LLC Cc David A Forster was granted agent and AIF status via resolution on Mar If Tana wants it revoked she will provide a date of revocation Please draft the appropriate document for Teresas review Tana Im on vacation Oct The EPMI consent electing Forster as VP is dated Oct Its on it way to you Thanks to everyone Lori Pinder Supervisor Corporate Services and Assistant Secretary Smith St Room Houston Texas Fax
Resignation LetterHere you go

Enron Net Works LLCTana Are there changes to the managers for the above entity Current managers are Derrick Haedicke and Whalley with many business units removing Derrick and Whalley to comply with the marketing affiliate rule I did not know if your entities would be subject to the same Please let me know Thanks Lori Pinder Supervisor Corporate Services and Assistant Secretary Smith St Room Houston Texas Fax

RE Enron Net Works LLCI didnt think so but I had to ask Thanks Original Message From Jones Tana Sent Friday November PM To Pinder Lori Subject FW Enron Net Works LLC Original Message From Taylor Mark E Legal Sent Friday November PM To Jones Tana Subject RE Enron Net Works LLC Net Works is not a marketing affiliate We can make changes if they want us to Original Message From Jones Tana Sent Friday November AM To Taylor Mark E Legal Subject FW Enron Net Works LLC I am not aware of any changes are you Original Message From Pinder Lori Sent Friday November AM To Jones Tana Subject Enron Net Works LLC Tana Are there changes to the managers for the above entity Current managers are Derrick Haedicke and Whalley with many business units removing Derrick and Whalley to comply with the marketing affiliate rule I did not know if your entities would be subject to the same Please let me know Thanks Lori Pinder Supervisor Corporate Services and Assistant Secretary Smith St Room Houston Texas Fax

RE Enron Metals Commodity CorpI sent it to Ed with latest changes Original Message From Mann Kay Sent Sunday December PM To Pinder Lori Subject Enron Metals Commodity Corp I think I still need the data sheet for this corp Thanks

Resignation purs to transfer to UBS Cc Please print and sign the attached letter resigning your appointment as an attorney in fact and return to me for filing in the corporate records Thanks Lori Pinder Supervisor Corporate Services and Assistant Secretary Smith St Room Houston Texas Fax

FW Resignation purs to transfer to UBSJon please use this resignation letter in lieu of the one sent on Friday This letter is more specific and addresses only the need I have for the minute book on Enron Canada Corp Thanks Lori Pinder Supervisor Corporate Services and Assistant Secretary Smith St Room Houston Texas Fax

Committee Meeting Poll Cc We are in the process of determining the Committee meeting schedule for December Please let us know approximately how much time you may require for your agenda in order to ensure the appropriate allotment of time Thanks Lori Pinder Supervisor Corporate Services and Assistant Secretary Smith St Room Houston Texas

Re Reference creditsthe attached wish list of the US companies only the ones that cannot be approved until I get additional info are Baltimore Gas Electric Lucent Technologies Monsanto Sun Microsystems Union Carbide and Viacom I will get additional ones to you Weds am To Lori ES cc Subject Re Reference credits Lori here is the initial wish list from the credit derivatives people If you can focus on these first and let me know about them Id appreciate it Forwarded by Mark TaylorHOUECT on PM David Forster PM To Bryan CT cc Mark CT Paul CT Edmund CT Debbie R CT David CT William S CT Rod CT Mark CT David CT Martin CT John CT Subject Re Reference credits Bryan I believe Mark Taylor is out of the office until Wednesday At this point I believe there are approved Reference Entities for EnronOnline We will add more up to the previously discussed as approvals are received Dave Bryan Seyfried PM To Mark CT Paul CT Edmund CT Debbie R CT David CT William S CT Rod CT cc Mark CT David CT Martin CT John CT Subject Reference credits After reviewing all of the lists attached is the list of reference credits that I forwarded to Mark to load on Enorn Online Call me if you have any concerns

FW EWS Networks EntitiesMark I am forwarding this to you because Tanas return email message stated that she would not be back to work until Nov Any help you can give me will be greatly appreciated Thanks Original Message From Pinder Lori Sent Friday November PM To Jones Tana Subject EWS Networks Entities Tana Your entities are classified as being potentially subject to FERC reporting requirements Jim Derrick and Greg Whalley were to come off the slates Nov I need to paper the GlisanBowen swap as well as the replacements for Messrs Derrick and Whalley Please let me know who will replace Messrs Derrick and Whalley so I can paper all of the above for the entities listed below Clickpapercom LLC CommodityLogic LLC DealBench LLC Enron Net Works LLC EnronOnline LLC Directors JDerrick MHaedicke GWhalley Thanks Lori Pinder Supervisor Corporate Services and Assistant Secretary Smith St Room Houston Texas Fax
